info:
Requires External JS library:
https://discourse.nodered.org/t/generation-of-uuid-in-function-node/2381/4

# install UUID Library
npm install uuid

# add to settings.js

`
    functionGlobalContext: {
        // os:require('os'),
	uuidv1:require('C:/Users/youruser/node_modules/uuid/v1')

    },
`
